metaTags.metaTitle: Cloudflare Turnstile, a free CAPTCHA replacement
metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare Turnstile is a simple, free CAPTCHA replacement so web visitors have great, CAPTCHA-free experiences.

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare Turnstile
relatedBlades.subtitle: A verification tool to replace CAPTCHAs
relatedBlades.copy: Eliminate the frustrating experience of CAPTCHAs with a simple snippet of free code. Cloudflare Turnstile confirms web visitors are real and blocks unwanted bots without slowing down web experiences for real users.

imageAssetFile.altText: Animation of Cloudflare's free CAPTCHA alternative
imageAssetFile.title: Turnstile - Hero - Gif

contentfulAsset.description: Animation of Cloudflare's free CAPTCHA alternative

columnContent.title: Deliver better experiences
columnContent.description: Your users no longer have to waste time and effort solving visual puzzles. Turnstile works transparently to confirm they are real people.

columnContent.title: Strengthen privacy
columnContent.description: Unlike [CAPTCHA](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/bots/how-captchas-work/) options, Turnstile never harvests data for ad retargeting. You can preserve the privacy of your users without sacrificing effectiveness.

columnContent.title: Integrated with application security
columnContent.description: Easily integrate Turnstile with Cloudflare Web Application Firewall ([WAF](https://www.cloudflare.com/application-services/products/waf/)) rules, and manage challenges via the WAF. Improve user experiences while blocking more attacks.

iconAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Firewall as a Service - Magic Firewall
iconAssetFile.title: Firewall as a service icon

relatedBlades.title: Verify web visitors without CAPTCHA
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare Turnstile can be easily embedded into any website — without having to send traffic through the Cloudflare network. 

Turnstile can generate multiple types of non-intrusive challenges to verify users are human, all without showing visitors a puzzle.

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of the end of CAPTCHAs

relatedBlades.description: Stop bots without degrading real user experiences

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare named a Strong Performer in The Forrester Wave™: Bot Management Software, Q3 2024
relatedBlades.copy: We believe this recognition validates Cloudflare's application security approach that prioritizes an easy to use, enterprise-grade bot solution built on a global, programmable connectivity cloud.

imageAssetFile.altText: The Forrester Wave™: Bot Management Software
imageAssetFile.title: The Forrester Wave™: Bot Management Software

contentfulAsset.description: The Forrester Wave™: Bot Management Software

content.value: "Based on Cloudflare's input we switched to a payment gateway that offered better security and integrated Turnstile, Cloudflare's smart CAPTCHA alternative."
